place.name: TRELLECK GRANGE
place.gazetteerText: TRELLECK-GRANGE, a chapelry in Trelleck parish, Monmouth; 6 miles NNW of Chepstow r. station. Post town, Chepstow. Acres 1,774. Real property, £1,788. Pop., 137. Houses, 22. The living is a p. curacy in the diocese of Llandaff. Value, £74. Patron, the Duke of Beaufort. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
